Play:
The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags
(Katakiuchi tsuzure no nishiki / 敵討襤褸錦敵討襤褸錦)

Written By: Matsuda Bunkōdō (文耕堂) , Miyoshi Shōraku (三好松洛)

First Staged: 1736

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 310, February 1991; Bunraku February 1991 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

February 1971: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags

February 1977: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags

February 1991: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags

Characters:

Shundo Sukedayu (Shundō Sukedayū / 春藤助太夫)

Sahei, Suketayu's servant (Wakatō Sahei / 若党佐兵衛)

Dempachi, a broker (Kumade no Denpachi / 熊手の伝八)

Rokuroemon Sudo (Sudō Rokurōemon / 須藤六郎右衛門)

Jinroku Hikosaka (Hikosaka Jinroku / 彦坂甚六)

Oteru, a dancing girl (Maiko Oteru / 舞子おてる)

Katsuno, a dancing girl (Maiko Katsumo / 舞子かつの)

Ikuyo, a dancing girl (Maiko Ikuyo / 舞子いく世)

Suketaro Shundo (Shundō Suketarō / 春藤助太郎)

Shinshichi Shundo (Shundō Shinshichi / 春藤新七)

Page (Kobōzu / 小坊主)

Oshimo, Rokuroemon's sister (Sudō Imōto Oshimo / 須藤妹お霜)

Oyana, a cook (Makanai Oyana / 賄おやな)

Okatsu, a housewife (Nyōbō Okatsu / 女房おかつ)

Otsuya, a housewife (Nyōbō Otsuya / 女房おつや)

Jiroemon Shundo (Shundō Jirōemon / 春藤次郎右衛門)

Oharu, Jiroemon's wife (Tsuma Oharu / 妻お春)

Sukedayu's wife (Sukedayū tsuma / 助太夫妻)

Ihei, a servant (Wakatō Ihei / 若党伊兵衛)

Oshimo's mother (Sudō haha / 須藤母)

Udaemon (Utaemon) Kamura (Kamura Udaemon (Utaemon) / 加村宇田右衛門)

Yoroku (Yoroku / 与六)

Buemon Takaichi (Takaichi Buemon / 高市武右衛門)

Shonosuke, Buemon's son (Sekare Shōnosuke / 伜庄之助)

Samurai (Shugyōja / 修行者)
